pr_title: Fix incorrect Maven dependencies in Kafka Reactive Messaging tutorial

timeline.bodyText: You need to also change the extension name in the sentence above: "First, you need to include the quarkus-jsonb extension".
timeline.author: gsmet
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -419,7 +419,7 @@ First, you need to include the `quarkus-jsonb` extension (if you already use the
 ----
 <dependency>
     <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
-    <artifactId>quarkus-jsonb</artifactId>
+    <artifactId>quarkus-resteasy-jsonb</artifactId>

replies.bodyText: Oh, thanks, I am on it
replies.author: serranisimo

replies.bodyText: this is my first contribution to a OS project ever 💃
replies.author: serranisimo

timeline.author: gsmet
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -470,7 +470,7 @@ First, you need to include the `quarkus-jackson` extension (if you already use t
 ----

     <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
-    <artifactId>quarkus-jackson</artifactId>
+    <artifactId>quarkus-resteasy-jackson</artifactId>

timeline.message: Fix incorrect Maven dependencies in the Kafka reactive messaging guide
